sentences.sContent: In my childhood, local dairies bought milk from local farmers.
sentences.sCn: 在我小时候，本地的乳品公司向当地农场主收购牛奶。

sentences.sContent: He avoids all meat and dairy products.
sentences.sCn: 他不吃任何肉类和奶制品。

synos.tran: 奶制品；乳牛；制酪场；[食品]乳品店；牛奶及乳品业
[食品]乳品的；牛奶的；牛奶制的；产乳的

phrases.pCn: 乳品业，乳品加工业；乳制品行业

words.tran: 酪农场的女工；乳牛场的女工
乳牛场主，乳品加工工人

trans.tranCn: 奶制品；乳牛；制酪场；乳品店；牛奶及乳品业
trans.tranOther: a place on a farm where milk is kept and butter and cheese are made

trans.tranCn: 乳品的；牛奶的；牛奶制的；产乳的
trans.tranOther: Dairy is used to refer to foods such as butter and cheese that are made from milk
